1974.subject: NURS
1974.descrlong: NURS 499S is a field experience in the community synthesizing service learning and community health nursing concepts necessary for registered nurses to manage and/or deliver care to individuals, families, and populations across the lifespan. The student integrates and unifies a community nursing skill set with concepts that inform the practice of nursing in multicultural populations focusing on health promotion and disease prevention. Letter Grade Available.
